task_description: {'component_name': 'Main Container for AuthCore', 'description': 'Primary container for AuthCore implementation: authVault is a monolithic backend service offering comprehensive authentication and user management APIs for web and mobile apps. It centralizes all core auth features—user registration, login, password reset, profile management, and role-based access control—within a single deployable backend unit, simplifying deployment and maintenance.', 'framework': 'react', 'platform': 'web'}
